original_text: Therefore hearken not unto the words of the prophets that speak unto you, saying, Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon: for they prophesy a lie unto you.
korean_text: 그러므로 당신들은 바벨론의 왕을 섬기게 되지 아니하리라 하는 선지자의 말을 듣지 마소서 그들은 거짓을 예언함이니이다

sentences.original_text: Therefore hearken not unto the words of the prophets
saying, Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon:
for they prophesy a lie unto you.
